data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kodada, Ján, Derka, Tomáš, Čiampor, Fedor (2012): Description of Jolyelmis spangleri a new species from Churí-tepui (Chimantá Massif, Venezuela), with a description of the larva of J. spangleri and J. reitmaieri (Insecta: Coleoptera: Elmidae). Zootaxa 3223: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280273
